title: Opry le Daniel ar Thura
overview: Daniel O'Donnell returns to the Millennium Forum in Derry to present 'Opry le Daniel ar Thuras'. This series features a host of Country music stars such as Brendan Shine, Susan McCann & Dominic Kirwan who celebrate "Country n'Irish" with their special guests, Emily Shine, Sinead Heaney & Barry Kirwan. A brand new series, jam packed with country music hits and all hosted by the King of Country, Daniel O'Donnell!
